generated_body: Upon clicking "The Real Reason McDonald's Keeps the Filet-O-Fish on Their Menu," the user may expect an exploration of the strategic decisions behind McDonald's enduring inclusion of this particular sandwich. The article is likely to delve into factors such as consumer demand, seasonal promotions, and the sandwich's cultural significance, especially in relation to Lent when fish options are more popular. Additionally, it could discuss historical sales data or marketing strategies that highlight why the Filet-O-Fish remains a staple despite competition from other menu items.
